Text: Todu go, o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, kpai iko le̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu nako Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kwef amu le̩ dabiwa,

nakʼabuche̩ichi du wajo̩, oñ nako ma gwo̩ru wʼef o̩go̩ Jiho̩shafat, tak u nache ma alu kʼajo̩ ka tod amone̩-mi kpʼe̩wñ ogu-mi Israe̩l, e-kʼama fʼuma fiatuka rʼef abuche̩ichi ku ma laño̩ fʼane̩-mi kpe̩rʼojoji,
ma la ranya tod abo-mi, ma mʼimo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du la ajo̩ko̩, ma la dʼimo̩to̩ onobule̩ ta todu o̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, ma la mʼu du ñmo̩ me̩.

Ochochi, e̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai ame̩, O Taya kpai Saido̩n? kpai ane̩ Filistia chaka? Akoji e̩wñʼka me̩ du ñw mi le̩? I la che̩wñ ku me̩ adʼakoji ñw mi, omi ahika dʼakoji-me̩ le̩ dabiwa abʼume̩ onugo oji ma piopio.
Todu ame̩ mʼajifa-mi kpʼo̩jamalia-mi ko, kʼame̩ mʼe̩wñ alifia-mi ki abe̩do̩ le̩ ño̩ jʼef unyi ode-me̩.
Me̩ la mʼamo̩ma Juda kpʼamo̩ma Je̩rusale̩m ko ta ñw amo̩ma abo Grik la, todu ku me̩ mʼuma ño̩ bʼalo̩me̩ ane̩-ma te̩ nyʼo̩najiji.
Go, omi ako ma kwane̩ kwʼugbo ku me̩ ko ma ta nyi le̩, oñ u nadʼakoji-me̩ dabiwa abʼume̩ onugo oji ma.
Tak u nakʼamo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ta rʼef o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Juda, oñ ma ako ma ta ñw abo Sheba, abuche̩ichi ku ma jʼo̩najiji le̩; todu Jihofa ka me̩.
Me̩ ki dʼe-i kpogo ef abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi kakini,
Me̩ kʼuko̩che̩-me̩ gwʼo̩kwo̩chageli,
Me̩ hiane̩ wa,
Abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki nakʼo̩la-ma kwane̩,
Dʼujo̩ka kadʼo,
O̩wo̩ one̩, o̩wo̩ one̩,
Olu kpʼochu achubi me̩,
Jihofa la de̩ Zayo̩n akwa,
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩,
Oñ o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i
Ijipti achʼalache̩ te̩
